thoughts.text: The website I browsed does not provide the information I need. I'll use the 'google' command to search for top attractions and activities to do in Africa.
thoughts.reasoning: If one website doesn't have the information I need, it's best to move on to the next one. Using the 'google' command will allow me to find more websites with the information I need.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the information on each website
- Read through the summaries and gather the most important information
- Use the information to decide on a language to start learning and a destination to visit
- Use the 'generate_image' command to generate an image of the top language learning resources and travel destinations
- Use the 'google' command to search for top attractions and activities to do in Africa
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am using reliable sources when gathering information. I should also take the time to read through the websites in more detail if necessary.
